verses.verse: Let us therefore<WG3767> fear,<WG5399> lest,<WG3379> a promise<WG1860> being left<WG2641> us of entering<WG1525> into<WG1519> his<WG846> rest,<WG2663> any<WG5100> of<WG1537> you<WG5216> should seem<WG1380> to come short<WG5302> of it.

For <WG1063> unto us<WG2532> was the gospel preached,<WG2070> <WG2097> as well as<WG2509> unto them:<WG2548> but<WG235> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> preached<WG189> did not<WG3756> profit<WG5623> them,<WG1565> not<WG3361> being mixed with<WG4786> faith<WG4102> in them that heard<WG191> it.

For <WG1063> we which have believed<WG4100> do enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> rest,<WG2663> as<WG2531> he said,<WG2046> As<WG5613> I have sworn<WG3660> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> wrath,<WG3709> if<WG1487> they shall enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> rest:<WG2663> although<WG2543> the<WG3588> works<WG2041> were finished<WG1096> from<WG575> the foundation<WG2602> of the world.<WG2889>

For <WG1063> he spake<WG2046> in a certain place<WG4225> of<WG4012> the<WG3588> seventh<WG1442> day on this wise,<WG3779> And<WG2532> God<WG2316> did rest<WG2664> the<WG3588> seventh<WG1442> day<WG2250> from<WG575> all<WG3956> his<WG848> works.<WG2041>
And <WG2532> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> place again,<WG3825> If<WG1487> they shall enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> rest.<WG2663>

Seeing <WG1893> therefore<WG3767> it remaineth<WG620> that some<WG5100> must enter<WG1525> therein,<WG1519> <WG846> and<WG2532> they to whom it was first preached<WG2097> <WG4386> entered not in<WG1525> <WG3756> because<WG1223> of unbelief: <WG543>

Again, <WG3825> he limiteth<WG3724> a certain<WG5100> day,<WG2250> saying<WG3004> in<WG1722> David,<WG1138> Today,<WG4594> after<WG3326> so long<WG5118> a time;<WG5550> as<WG2531> it is said,<WG2046> Today<WG4594> if<WG1437> ye will hear<WG191> his<WG846> voice,<WG5456> harden<WG4645> not<WG3361> your<WG5216> hearts.<WG2588>
For <WG1063> if<WG1487> Joshua<WG2424> had given them rest,<WG2664> <WG846> then would he not<WG3756> <WG302> afterward<WG3326> <WG5023> have spoken<WG2980> of<WG4012> another<WG243> day.<WG2250>
There remaineth<WG620> therefore<WG686> a rest<WG4520> to the<WG3588> people<WG2992> of God.<WG2316>

For <WG1063> he that is entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> his<WG846> rest,<WG2663> he<WG846> also<WG2532> hath ceased<WG2664> from<WG575> his own<WG848> works,<WG2041> as<WG5618> God<WG2316> did from<WG575> his.<WG2398>

Let us labor<WG4704> therefore<WG3767> to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> that<WG1565> rest,<WG2663> lest<WG3363> any man<WG5100> fall<WG4098> after<WG1722> the<WG3588> same<WG846> example<WG5262> of unbelief.<WG543>

For <WG1063> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> is quick,<WG2198> and<WG2532> powerful,<WG1756> and<WG2532> sharper<WG5114> than<WG5228> any<WG3956> two-edged<WG1366> sword,<WG3162> piercing<WG1338> even<WG2532> to<WG891> the dividing asunder<WG3311> of<WG5037> soul<WG5590> and<WG2532> spirit,<WG4151> and<WG5037> of the joints<WG719> and<WG2532> marrow,<WG3452> and<WG2532> is a discerner<WG2924> of the thoughts<WG1761> and<WG2532> intents<WG1771> of the heart.<WG2588>

Neither <WG2532> <WG3756> is<WG2076> there any creature<WG2937> that is not manifest<WG852> in his sight:<WG1799> <WG846> but<WG1161> all things<WG3956> are naked<WG1131> and<WG2532> opened<WG5136> unto the<WG3588> eyes<WG3788> of him<WG846> with<WG4314> whom<WG3739> we have to do.<WG2254> <WG3056>

Seeing then<WG3767> that we have<WG2192> a great<WG3173> high priest,<WG749> that is passed into<WG1330> the<WG3588> heavens,<WG3772> Jesus<WG2424> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> let us hold fast<WG2902> our profession.<WG3671>

For <WG1063> we have<WG2192> not<WG3756> a high priest<WG749> which cannot<WG1410> <WG3361> be touched with the feeling of<WG4834> our<WG2257> infirmities;<WG769> but<WG1161> was in<WG2596> all points<WG3956> tempted<WG3985> like as<WG2596> <WG3665> we are, yet without<WG5565> sin.<WG266>

Let us therefore<WG3767> come<WG4334> boldly<WG3326> <WG3954> unto the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> of grace,<WG5485> that<WG2443> we may obtain<WG2983> mercy,<WG1656> and<WG2532> find<WG2147> grace<WG5485> to help in time of need.<WG1519> <WG2121> <WG996>
